name: Bullet Hell Platformer (Rainsong, Enjaku)
description:
for Bullet Hell Jam (April 2022)
theme: Confined
https://itch.io/jam/bullet-hell-jam-2022

Combined two genres (bullet hell and platformer) with a literal take on the main theme. You're a bullet, confined in a single cavern in Hell, for the declared theme.

Left and Right -- A/D or left and right arrows
Jump (can do multiple/double jumps) -- W, up-arrow, space bar

Avoid the blue star laser-bullets. If they hit you, you lose health points.
Try to pick up the green spike/flechette bullets. They give you health points.

Sound Effects / Voice: Enjaku (using Reaper)
>>> Tile textures: textures.com - coal('ash' background and tiles cut from 'emitting') The textures were pre-made by that texture company, and legally used.  The tiles made from the texture files were done during the jam. <<<
Coding, other art: Rainsong (using Unity and Affinity Designer)
